body.name: Differin Face Moisturizer, Soothing Lotion for Face and Body, Gentle Skin Care for Acne Prone Sensitive Skin, 4 oz (Packaging May Vary)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 26 - 29 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: INSTANT SOOTHING: Relieves dryness and instantly soothes skin, and can provide 48 hours of hydration
GENTLE FORMULA: Non-comedogenic and dermatologist-recommended, pH-balanced formula for less irritation that won’t clog pores
BALANCE SKIN: Lightweight formulation helps balance moisture in your skin to soothe and soften
DOES NOT CONTAIN: Lanolin, benzoyl peroxide, salicylic acid, adapalene, or other acne-fighting ingredient
HOW TO USE: Apply all over face, hands and body to hydrate skin and relieve dryness
body.description: Differin Soothing Moisturizer is a gentle, absorbent moisturizer formulated to immediately help restore your skin’s natural moisture barrier and help prevent dryness before it starts. It’s gentle, pH-balanced formula is non-comedogenic so it’ll provide skin with serious hydration without blocking pores. This moisturizer is compatible for daily use with Differin Gel to soothe dryness while leaving skin soft and smooth. The light formula absorbs easily to rapidly help restore your skin’s natural protective barrier. Differin Soothing Moisturizer contains no lanolin, benzoyl peroxide, salicylic acid, adapalene, or other acne-fighting ingredients.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Use Differin Moisturizers? Dermatologist-tested & designed All Differin Moisturizers are designed to gently hydrate and nourish your skin without clogging pores. Suitable for all skin types Whether you have sensitive, oily or dry skin, each moisturizer is non-comedogenic and gentle. Use as part of your routine Differin Moisturizers are the perfect final step in your daily skincare regimen. Pair them with other Differin Cleansers and Treatments for best results.

Differin Soothing Moisturizer Differin Oil Absorbing Moisturizer with SPF 30 Differin Restorative Night Moisturizer Differin Daily Oil-Free Hydrating Cleanser Differin Adapalene Gel 0.1% Acne Treatment Differin Resurfacing Scar Gel Use For Preventing Dryness Hydrating Sun Protection Deep Moisturizing Gentle Hydrating Clearing and Preventing Acne Minimizing the Appearance of Post-Acne Scars Key Ingredient Glycerin 3% Avobenzone 5% Octisalate 7% Octocrylene Hyaluronic Acid 5% Polyhydroxy Acids 0.1% Adapalene Bakuchiol Target Areas Face Face Face Face Face Face Skin Type Acne-Prone, Sensitive Oily Skin All Skin Types Oily Skin Acne-Prone All Skin Types

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No scent, no break-outs, no oily residue and no pilling.
reviews.reviewText: This moisturizer is fabulous! One of the best I've ever used! it did calm my rosacea, did not burn, did not make my skin oily, had no fragrance and wasn't greasy. The pump keeps you from contaminating the contents. A little pricey for the volume compared to other moisturizers, but there are also others that cost a lot more. I'm super happy with this product and intent to buy more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best for Differin users
reviews.reviewText: All I want to say is this is the best after care lotion I’ve been able to find to pair with Differin gel. Obviously since it’s meant to be use with it however I liked other night creams and would try to use them but changing to thin the night I used the Differin treatment was a game changer. This cream does burn a little but I think it’s the treatment more than the lotion. This lotion will keep my skin from drying out and I wake up with very hydrated skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seems to work very well
reviews.reviewText: I've never tried this before, but I had little bumps under my eye and this was a recommended product to help them go away (don't ask me the technical term). It worked, and now I use it as a product, it makes my skin super soft and moisturized

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Trouble with pilling when used with other Differin products
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to love this, but unfortunately I had problems with it pilling when used over the Niacinamide serum or Differin gel. I do not have this problem if it is used alone so I will use this on the rare days I am not using other products. On it's own it is very hydrating and feels nice on the skin, so if it works for you-I am jealous.I have not had this issue with the Restorative Night Moisturizer from Differin though, so I will just be using that as my day and night moisturizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great affordable moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: So I’ve been using this moisturizer now, for I think two or three years. I have a really dry sensitive skin and this works really well for me. Because I found in the past other moisturizers, always have to end up applying more to get the proper moisturization saw my skin doesn’t feel dry. So I’ve been using this moisturizer now, for I think two or three years. I have a really dry sensitive skin and this works really well for me. Because I found in the past other moisturizers, I would have to end up applying more to get the proper moisturization so my skin doesn’t feel dry. This product isn’t super heavy, but does give you good moisturization.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love the entire line of Differin. But this moisturizer took it to a whole other world!! I love, love this!! Did I mention I love this??? lol you can’t go wrong I promise you!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best moisturizer I’ve found
reviews.reviewText: This is hands down the best moisturizer I’ve ever used. It immediately makes my skin feel plump and soft and I’ve never had any breakouts from it.I can’t understand why Differin seems to have stopped making it.
